title: Why cant i play the tutorial
body: So, I just got the game but when i login in it brings me to this screen that says to wait for the game to finish downloading. Ive been waiting for a while but the play button is still greyed out. Any way to fix this or should i just wait?

replies.body: If the play button is greyed out it either means that your client is in the middle of updating, or your network may not be able to get connected to the matchmaking servers. Do me a favor and try updating your DNS and port forwarding settings as those can route your connection in a better way than most defaults. Check our this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for those two steps, and let me know if they help or not!
